page.title: 07EATING HABITS
page.content: THE POPULAR VIEW OF THE EATING HABITS OF THE SCOTS IS THAT THEY EAT A LOT OF PORRIDGE.A RECENT SURVEY ON DIET CARRIED OUT IN GOUROCK REVEALED A VERY DIFFERENT PICTURE.FOR BREAKFAST MOST PEOPLE ATE BACON AND EGGS OR BREAKFAST CEREALS SUCH AS CORN FLAKES.HARDLY ANYONE ATE PORRIDGE. MANY LOCAL PEOPLE ARE BECOMING MUCH MORE HEALTH CONSCIOUS AND SEEM TO HAVE A GOOD IDEA ABOUT WHAT FOODS ARE GOOD OR BAD FOR YOU.MANY PEOPLE NOW TRY TO EAT MORE ROUGHAGE-FOR EXAMPLE FOODS LIKE BRAN FLAKES-AND LESS FATTENING FOODS.
